from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
from machine import RTC
import ntptime
import time
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from event_manager import *
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
import sys
import uselect
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed
from aiot_ir_receiver import *
import music

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

event_manager.reset()

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

def on_event_timer_callback_J_g_P_t_i():
  global cmd, RT, RH, PASS, ADMIN, STATUS, LUX, pir
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  RT = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  RH = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  LUX = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RT)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(8, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RH)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(LUX)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  print((''.join([str(x) for x in ['!1:TEMP:', aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature(), '#']])), end =' ')
  time.sleep_ms(100)
  print((''.join([str(x2) for x2 in ['!1:HUMI:', aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity(), '#']])), end =' ')
  time.sleep_ms(100)
  print((''.join([str(x3) for x3 in ['!1:LIGHT:', round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100)), '#']])), end =' ')

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_J_g_P_t_i)

def on_event_timer_callback_U_t_E_r_i():
  global cmd, RT, RH, PASS, ADMIN, STATUS, LUX, pir
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[2])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(2, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('/')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[1])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('/')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[0])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(14, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[5])))

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_U_t_E_r_i)

def on_event_timer_callback_Y_X_n_U_C():
  global cmd, RT, RH, PASS, ADMIN, STATUS, LUX, pir
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(':')
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  time.sleep_ms(1000)

event_manager.add_timer_event(2000, on_event_timer_callback_Y_X_n_U_C)

def on_event_timer_callback_t_c_I_L_C():
  global cmd, RT, RH, PASS, ADMIN, STATUS, LUX, pir
  if pin3.read_digital()==1:
    if pir == '0':
      display.set_all('#ff0000')
      pir = '1'
      print('1', end =' ')
  else:
    if pir == '1':
      display.set_all('#000000')
      pir = '0'
      print('0', end =' ')

event_manager.add_timer_event(1000, on_event_timer_callback_t_c_I_L_C)

def read_terminal_input():
  spoll=uselect.poll()        # Set up an input polling object.
  spoll.register(sys.stdin, uselect.POLLIN)    # Register polling object.

  input = ''
  if spoll.poll(0):
    input = sys.stdin.read(1)

    while spoll.poll(0):
      input = input + sys.stdin.read(1)

  spoll.unregister(sys.stdin)
  return input

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin0.pin, 4)

def on_event_timer_callback_Z_w_W_I_K():
  global cmd, RT, RH, PASS, ADMIN, STATUS, LUX, pir
  cmd = read_terminal_input()
  if cmd == '1#':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ff0000'))
  if cmd == '0#':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
  if cmd == '3#':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if cmd == '2#':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

event_manager.add_timer_event(200, on_event_timer_callback_Z_w_W_I_K)

aiot_ir_rx = IR_RX(Pin(pin1.pin, Pin.IN)); aiot_ir_rx.start();

def Ki_E1_BB_83m_Tra_M_E1_BA_ADt_M_C3_A3():
  global cmd, RT, RH, PASS, ADMIN, STATUS, LUX, pir, aiot_dht20, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_ir_rx, tiny_rgb
  if aiot_ir_rx.get_code() == IR_REMOTE_1:
    music.play(['A3:1'], wait=True)
    PASS = str(PASS) + '1'
